rules_text:
Spells you control can't be countered this turn.
Pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]A few years after the invasion left Ilcae ruined, the Wonderlands overlaid itself onto patches of the plane, rewriting its oil-stained ground into fresh grass and vibrant color overnight.[/i]
